title: An innovative approach for assessing coronary artery lesions: Fusion of wrist pulse and photoplethysmography using a multi-sensor pulse diagnostic device
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): M.A. Xiaotian, Rui Guo, Chunke Zhang, Jianjun Yan, Guangyao Zhu, Wenjie Wu, Haixia Yan, Leixin Hong
